name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Summerset Collector's Ed. Upgrade - Prepurchase
name_original: The Elder Scrolls Online: Summerset Collector's Ed. Upgrade - Prepurchase
description:
Summerset available June 5, 2018.

Pre-purchase your upgrade and immediately receive the Nightmare Senche Mount and a bonus copy of the Morrowind Chapter for a limited time. Start your adventure in Summerset with exclusive bonus content in The Elder Scrolls Online: Summerset Collector’s Edition. Explore the home of the High Elves, unlock a new skill line of abilities, and save the world from destruction. 

The Digital Collector’s Edition includes exclusive bonus content:
• Exclusive Mount: Bloodshadow Wraith Steed
• Exclusive Pet: Fledgling Gryphon
• Emote Pack: House of Reveries
• Exclusive Outfit Style: Divine Prosecution
• Exclusive Memento: Psijic Scrying Talisman

Queen’s Bounty Pack: 
• Court of Bedlam Costume 
• Pocket Salamander Pet 
• Treasure Maps 
• Psijic Order Crown Crate 
• Experience Scrolls
